Articles.Content:
Bigger crew shoudl generate better reports in terms of science points.

That woudl ancourage players to actually send more than single kerbal on mission.
Maybe at first, like if you have a bigger capsule they do experiments that require two people.

It might make the science lab useful. Right now it's a big heavy thing that isn't worth the teeny boost to the transmission penalty or the "but you can clean the canisters" feature, given that you can just spam canisters.
